@Alexandra933 *canâ€™t manufacture more with physics on our perpetual scale, as far as I know

@Alexandra933 In the real world, the world around us would then appear to be moving in slow motion. Applied in a digital or VR space, we lose or can modify the points of reference of the environment, and wouldnâ€™t see it in slow motion. The result could be â€œmore timeâ€.

@Alexandra933 We can manufacture more on our scale with physics, but we can change our perception and experience of it. The trick would be to modify our consciousness to process more in a shorter amount of time.
